timeline.message: Add simple BIR spec test to read bir binary and validate

timeline.bodyText: There seems to be lots of work in validating a very simple bir? Can't we simplify this. I mean some assert function that would validate the expected and the current would be useful.
timeline.author: riyafa

replies.bodyText: Then the expected and the current would be more obvious. I think they are hidden in some complex code at the present
replies.author: riyafa
